00011   // Get the samples and get an iterator ready to find the peak sample
00012   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = tpi->GetSamples();  
00013   std::vector<int>::iterator peak_sample_pos;
00014 
00015   // Find the position of the peak samples
00016   if (trigger_polarity == 1)
00017     peak_sample_pos = std::max_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00018   else if (trigger_polarity == -1)
00019     peak_sample_pos = std::min_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00020 
00021   // Now calculate the amplitude
00022   double amplitude = trigger_polarity*(*peak_sample_pos - pedestal);
00023
